author: cbs8
title: Legendary NBA Star Shaquille O'Neal Comes to Parx Casino® for the International Launch of ShaqBLACKJack
text:
Parx Casino
Launch Event Sunday, October 4, 2015
PHILADELPHIA , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Parx Casino®, located at 2999 Street Road in Bensalem, PA , is thrilled to announce the world-premiere launch of Shaq BLACKJack , an electrifying hybrid table-slot game exclusively at the #1 casino in Pennsylvania .
On October 4th , Shaquille O'Neal and Dynamic Gaming Systems will introduce the sensational new hybrid table-slot game, ShaqBLACKJack, at Parx Casino®. ShaqBLACKJack was developed over a four year period by New Jersey based Dynamic Gaming Systems and NBA Legend Shaquille O'Neal to create an action-packed new gaming experience. Twenty-four separate live "slot-like" blackjack games will be linked to a live blackjack game and dealer within a unique basketball themed enclave on the bustling gaming floor at Parx Casino®.
The concept of the 'hybrid' game evolved in the mind of Dynamic Gaming's CEO, Charlie Barksdale . "I wanted to find a way to make a casino game fun for everyone and find a way to bring Shaq's unique brand of humor to the gaming floor. We clicked right away when we started talking about creating this game. We wanted a game that was familiar to everyone, even those with a modest appetite for gaming, but one that would still provide us with opportunities to bring new elements of excitement and rewards to the experience."
For the world premiere of ShaqBLACKJack, Barksdale and O'Neal explored many options for the perfect gaming operation partner. With its incredible fanfare, over 150,000 people through its doors weekly, and its leadership position in Pennsylvania gaming, Parx Casino® was the ideal launching pad. "When we had the opportunity to play the game and we personally experienced Shaq's enthusiasm for creating this thrilling new game for our customers, we knew we had to have it. Shaq himself is synonymous with excitement, winning and fun – and that is what we want our guests to think about Parx," said Tony Ricci , CEO Parx Casino® .
The open-to-the-public event with Shaquille O'Neal will begin at 6:30pm on Sunday, October 4 th in the ShaqBLACKJack area of the casino floor. Participating guests will have the opportunity to win autographed memorabilia and free slot play every 15 minutes at the drawing drum.
For additional information on Parx Casino® and ShaqBLACKJack kindly contact Carrie Nork Minelli at 215.801.9389 or cnorkminelli@parxcasino.com .
ABOUT PARX CASINO®
Parx Casino ®, owned and operated by Greenwood Racing, Inc., is the number one revenue generating casino in Pennsylvania . Parx Casino® is conveniently located 20 minutes north of center city Philadelphia , I-95 exit 37 or PA Turnpike exit 351 (westbound), exit 352 (eastbound) onto Street Road in Bensalem . Parx features 174,000 square feet of gaming; 3,300 slot machines; over 100 live table games; 80 poker tables; live racing & simulcast action; Parxgrill , an upscale signature restaurant; Foodies food court; Chickie's & Pete's Crab House and Sports Bar; 360 bar and live music venue; Jax sports bar; Circle Bar ; Bambu Noodle House ; Earl of Sandwich ® and complimentary parking for over 5,000 cars. For more information on Parx Casino®, visit www.parxcasino.com .
